title: Smart Policy Control for Securing Federated Learning Management System
summaries: propose __policy controls__ using smart contracts to audit local training and manage global aggregation, securing the FL system and guaranteeing integrity of models
a smart contract-based local training policy control on the FL participants' side to verify the local training process
a smart contract-based aggregation policy to manage the global model aggregation process
Upon completion, the aggregated model and policy are stored on blockchain-based storage to allow participants of FL
systemModel: Policy Control Management System (PCM): manages and sends smart contracts to factories for local training and Aggrgegation Manager (BAM) for aggregation
$P$ number of smart factories, each factory is equipped with
an edge server $E_n$ connected to the Ethereum to do local training according to the smart contract local learning policy from Policy Control Managenement System
several IoT sensors $Z_n$, which generate data $L_n$ and send them to local datasets as the source of the edge server $E_n$
Blockchain Aggregation Manager (BAM): executes smart contract aggregation policy (PGM)
Blockchain Database Manager (BDM): stores global models and smart contract aggregation policies
questions: not allow for an audit of the training process
